title: (x) Used in a 1928 Vanity Fair ad - hand lettered {Yves}
content:
Charminette from Joe Vanderbos is a script in a very similar vein:   
   
 [http://www.vanderfont.com/type/page/CHARMINETTE.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000656/http:/www.vanderfont.com/type/page/CHARMINETTE.php)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/joevanderbos/charminette/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joevanderbos/charminette/)
author: marcox
